set_value.name: $InternalShipsQuota
set_value.comment: Number of ships to be added to internal storage before trying another dock area

debug_text.text: 'added ' + $Ship.knownname + ' to ' + (if $DockingBay.isstorage then 'storage dockingbay' else 'external dockingbay') + ' on dockarea ' + $DockingBay.walkablemodule

'fighter: no matching ship definition or loadout found.
faction: %s
tags: %s
loadout level: %s'.[$shipfaction, $fightertags, $loadoutlevel]
